__e: Where are we going? At first, we thought it was a breakdancing class, and them we thought it was a special needs class.
So when I was in junior high, my buddy Ray and I were really into break dancing.
Growing up, when you were mad at somebody, you would just break dance at 'em.
You leave the motor running, no handbrake, the gear not quite in park. It shifts into drive and it's off to the races.
Uh I will have you know I did a little breakin' back in my day, so you just might want to watch your step before I bust a sweet move in your face.
Since we were only on a break because of distance, I thought you wanted that too.
- (Recording stops) - How about "Shake it and break it" on two?
This year, the winner gets a walk-on role on Make It or Break It.
